homepage.heroSubtitle: Join us in bridging the digital divide and creating opportunities for everyone to learn, grow, and succeed in the digital age.

about.title: Our Mission
about.paragraph1: At Code For All, we believe that technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or circumstances. Our mission is to empower communities by providing free coding education, digital literacy programs, and technology resources.
about.paragraph2: We work with local organizations, schools, and community centers to bring technology education directly to underserved communities. Through hands-on workshops, mentorship programs, and collaborative projects, we're building a more inclusive digital future.
